location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper with manuscript additions in coloured inkDimensions: 975 x 637mm, on sheet 1023 x 680mm

mods.abstract: A map indicating the location of one buoy in the vicinity of Kishm in the Persian Gulf. The buoy is marked in manuscript on an inset map entitled 'Kishm and Parts Adjacent', with corresponding arrows drawn in the upper and left margins.The base map on which the buoy is indicated is Admiralty chart 2837a, 'Published at the Admiralty 1st. May 1862', 'Small corrections... III-1907'.A hand stamp on the verso reads, 'British India Steam Navigation Co. Ltd. Received 19 Aug. 1908'.
